kpi_info.title: period_duration (period_duration)
kpi_info.use: Duration of the measurement period in minutes.

kpi_info.title: TFO_ENABLE (M648C0)
kpi_info.use: The number of all possibilities to use the TFO service, received via H.248 interface according to 3GPP TS 29.232. UPDATED:When the use of TFO is successfully enabled in the requested connection. Note: This counter doesn't have a formula and the default (SUM) was used.

kpi_info.title: TFO_USE (M648C1)
kpi_info.use: The number of successful use of the TFO service for MSS-activated TFO connections. UPDATED:When MSS-activated TFO has been established between terminations (TFO codec negotiation initiated by MGW). Note: This counter doesn't have a formula and the default (SUM) was used.

kpi_info.title: TFO_FAIL (M648C2)
kpi_info.use: The number of failed use of the TFO service for MSS-activated TFO connections. UPDATED:When TFO cannot be established because of a TFO codec mismatch in the negotiation (initiated by MGW) after a TFO service request from MSS. Note: This counter doesn't have a formula and the default (SUM) was used.

kpi_info.title: TFO_CURRENT (M648C3)
kpi_info.use: The number of ongoing TFO services for all connections in which MGW has participated in TFO codec negotiations. This counter shows how many TFO services are currently on for all connections in one physical MGW. UPDATED:Incremented when TFO has been established between terminations and decremented when TFO has been ended.

kpi_info.title: TFO_PEAK (M648C4)
kpi_info.use: The highest number of simultaneous TFO services for all connections in which MGW has participated in TFO codec negotiations. This counter shows the largest value of the TFO_current counter during one result accumulation period for all connections in one physical MGW. UPDATED:Incremented when TFO has been established between terminations and TFO_current counter value reaches a new high.

kpi_info.title: TRFO_USE (M648C5)
kpi_info.use: The number of TrFO operation use for all audio and speech connections between two terminations. This counter shows how many times the TrFO operation has been successfully used for all connections in one physical MGW. UPDATED:When Iu/Nb/Mb UPs in both terminations have been established and both-way topology connected and there are TrFO services reserved for these two terminations. Note: This counter doesn't have a formula and the default (SUM) was used.

kpi_info.title: TRFO_CURRENT (M648C6)
kpi_info.use: The number of ongoing TrFO operations for all audio and speech connections between two subscriber terminations. This counter shows how many TrFO operations are currently on in one physical MGW. UPDATED:Incremented when Iu/Nb/Mb UPs established and both-way connection has been released.

kpi_info.title: TRFO_PEAK (M648C7)
kpi_info.use: The highest number of simultaneous TrFO operations for all audio and speech connections between two subscriber terminations. This counter shows the largest value of the TrFO_current counter in one result accumulation period in one physical MGW. UPDATED:When TrFO_current counter value reaches a new high.

kpi_info.title: TFO_ESTABLISH_TIMEOUT (M648C8)
kpi_info.use: The total number of timeouts waiting for TFO establishment after successful enable phase (initiated with H.248 interface) for connections where MGW has participated to TFO codec negotiations. UPDATED:When timer(PRFILE: WAIT_TIME_FOR_TFO) waiting for TFO establishment acknowledgement expires. Timer expiration has no effect to call. Note: This counter doesn't have a formula and the default (SUM) was used.

kpi_info.title: TFO_USE_PASSIVE_NEGOTIATION (M648C9)
kpi_info.use: The total amount of successful usage of TFO service, established by MGW. UPDATED:When TFO has been established after MGW has participated the TFO negotiation. No TFO service request from MSS. Note: This counter doesn't have a formula and the default (SUM) was used.

kpi_info.title: TFO_FAIL_PASSIVE_NEGOTIATION (M648C10)
kpi_info.use: The number of failed use of the TFO service after a TFO codec negotiation in which MGW has participated. UPDATED:When TFO cannot be established because of a TFO codec mismatch in the negotiation in which MGW has participated. No TFO service request from MSS. Note: This counter doesn't have a formula and the default (SUM) was used.

kpi_info.title: TFO_INTERRUPTED (M648C11)
kpi_info.use: The number of TFO state changes from TFO framing to non-TFO in all connections in which MGW has participated in TFO codec negotiation. UPDATED:When DSP indicates that TFO framing is no more received for an established TFO connection, for example, announcement during the call. Note: This counter doesn't have a formula and the default (SUM) was used.

kpi_info.title: TFO_GSM_EFR (M648C12)
kpi_info.use: The number of GSM EFR codec used successfully in TFO service in all connections in which MGW has participated in TFO codec negotiation. UPDATED:When TFO has been established with the GSM EFR codec. Note: This counter doesn't have a formula and the default (SUM) was used.

kpi_info.title: TFO_GSM_FR (M648C13)
kpi_info.use: The number of GSM FR codec used successfully in TFO service in all connections in which MGW has participated in TFO codec negotiation. UPDATED:When TFO has been established with GSM FR codec. Note: This counter doesn't have a formula and the default (SUM) was used.

kpi_info.title: TRANSCODING_USE (M648C14)
kpi_info.use: The number of audio and speech connections between two subscriber terminations in which transcoding has been used. This counter shows how many times transcoding has been used between two terminations for all connections in physical MGW. UPDATED:When Iu/Nb/Mb/Ater UPs in both terminations have been established, and both-way topology connected, and transcoding service(s) have been reserved at least for one termination. Note: This counter doesn't have a formula and the default (SUM) was used.

kpi_info.title: TRANSCODING_CURRENT (M648C15)
kpi_info.use: The number of ongoing audio and speech connections between two terminations where transcoding is being used in one physical MGW. UPDATED:Incremented when Iu/Nb/Mb/Ater UPs in both terminations have been established, and both-way topology connected, and transcoding service(s) have been reserved at least for one termination. Decremented after transcoding connection is released.

kpi_info.title: TRANSCODING_PEAK (M648C16)
kpi_info.use: The highest number of simultaneous audio and speech connections between two terminations where transcoding have been used. This counter shows the largest value of the transcoding_current counter in one result accumulation period in physical MGW. UPDATED:When transcoding connection between two termination has been established and transcoding_current counter value reaches a new high.

kpi_info.title: G711_USE (M648C17)
kpi_info.use: The number of audio and speech connections between two subscriber terminations in which G.711 service has been used for both terminations. This counter shows how many times G.711 service has been used between two terminations for all connections in physical MGW. UPDATED:When Iu/Nb/Mb UPs in both terminations have been established, both-way topology connected and G.711 services have been reserved to both subscribers. Note: This counter doesn't have a formula and the default (SUM) was used.

kpi_info.title: G711_CURRENT (M648C18)
kpi_info.use: The number of ongoing audio and speech connections between two terminations in which G.711 service has been used in one physical MGW. UPDATED:Incremented when Iu/Nb/Mb UPs in both terminations have been established, both-way topology connected and G.711 services have been reserved for both subscriber terminations. Decremented after G.711 connection between terminations is released.

kpi_info.title: G711_PEAK (M648C19)
kpi_info.use: The highest number of simultaneous audio and speech connections between two terminations in which G.711 service has been used. This counter shows the largest value of the g711_current counter in one result accumulation period in physical MGW. UPDATED:When G.711 connection between two terminations has been established and g711_current counter value reaches a new high.

kpi_info.title: TRFO_CODEC_MOD (M648C20)
kpi_info.use: The number of TrFO operations used for all audio and speech connections between two terminations after codec modification. UPDATED:When TrFO connection has been established after a codec modification request from MSS. Note: This counter doesn't have a formula and the default (SUM) was used.

kpi_info.title: TRANSCODING_CODEC_MOD (M648C21)
kpi_info.use: The number of all audio and speech connections between two terminations in which transcoding has been used after codec modification. UPDATED:When transcoding connection has been established after a codec modification request from MSS. Note: This counter doesn't have a formula and the default (SUM) was used.

kpi_info.title: G711_CODEC_MOD (M648C22)
kpi_info.use: The number of G.711 services for all audio and speech connections between two terminations after codec modification. UPDATED:When G.711 connection has been established after a codec modification request from MSS. Note: This counter doesn't have a formula and the default (SUM) was used.

kpi_info.title: TRFO_DSP_OPT (M648C23)
kpi_info.use: The number of TrFO operations used for all audio and speech connections between two terminations after DSP optimisation. UPDATED:When TrFO connection has been established after DSP optimisation by BC2PRB. Note: This counter doesn't have a formula and the default (SUM) was used.

kpi_info.title: TRANSCODING_DSP_OPT (M648C24)
kpi_info.use: The number of all audio and speech connections between two terminations in which transcoding has been used after DSP optimisation. UPDATED:When transcoding connection has been established after DSP optimisation by BC2PRB. Note: This counter doesn't have a formula and the default (SUM) was used.

kpi_info.title: G711_DSP_OPT (M648C25)
kpi_info.use: The number of G.711 service for all audio and speech connections between two terminations after DSP optimisation. UPDATED:When G.711 connection has been established after DSP optimisation by BC2PRB. Note: This counter doesn't have a formula and the default (SUM) was used.

kpi_info.title: TFO_GSM_HR (M648C26)
kpi_info.use: The number of GSM HR codec used in successful usage of TFO service where MGW has participated to TFO codec negotiations. When TFO has been established with GSM HR codec

kpi_info.title: TFO_AVERAGE (M648C27)
kpi_info.use: Average value of simultaneously active usage of TFO service in one Result Accumulation Period. Samples are taken in every 20 seconds from corresponding current counter and average value is calculated at the end of each Result Accumulation Period.

kpi_info.title: TRFO_AVERAGE (M648C28)
kpi_info.use: Average value of simultaneously active usage of TrFO service in one Result Accumulation Period. Samples are taken in every 20 seconds from corresponding current counter and average value is calculated at the end of each Result Accumulation Period.

kpi_info.title: TRANSCODING_AVERAGE (M648C29)
kpi_info.use: Average value of simultaneously active usage of transcoding service in one Result Accumulation Period. Samples are taken in every 20 seconds from corresponding current counter and average value is calculated at the end of each Result Accumulation Period.

kpi_info.title: G711_AVERAGE (M648C30)
kpi_info.use: Average value of simultaneously active usage of G711 codec in one Result Accumulation Period. Samples are taken in every 20 seconds from corresponding current counter and average value is calculated at the end of each Result Accumulation Period.

kpi_info.title: TFO_AMR_NB (M648C31)
kpi_info.use: The number of AMR NB codec used successfully in TFO service in all connections in which MGW has participated in TFO codec negotiation. When TFO has been established with the AMR NB codec.

kpi_info.title: TFO_AMR_WB (M648C32)
kpi_info.use: The number of AMR WB codec used successfully in TFO service in al connections in which MGW has participated in TFO codec negotiation. When TFO has been established with the AMR WB codec.

kpi_info.title: TFO_AMR_CURRENT (M648C33)
kpi_info.use: The number of ongoing TFO services for connections in which MGW has participated in TFO codec negotiations and AMR/AMR-WB codec is used. This counter shows how many TFO services with AMR/AMR-WB codec are currently on for all connections in one physical MGW. UPDATED: Incremented when TFO has been established between MGW and TFO peer that are using AMR/AMR-WB codec. Decremented when TFO has been ended.

kpi_info.title: TFO_AMR_PEAK (M648C34)
kpi_info.use: The highest number of simultaneous TFO services for all connections in which MGW has participated in TFO codec negotiations and TFO_AMR codec is used. This counter shows the highest value of the TFO_AMR_CURRENT counter during one result accumulation period for all connections in one physical MGW. UPDATED: When TFO_AMR_CURRENT counter value reaches a new high.

kpi_info.title: TFO_AMR_AVERAGE (M648C35)
kpi_info.use: The average value of simultaneously active usage of TFO service with AMR codec in one Result Accumulation Period. UPDATED: Samples are taken every 20 seconds from the corresponding current counter. The average value is calculated at the end of each result accumulation period.
